definition: to lean/to slant/oblique/prejudiced/to deviate from average/to stray from the intended line/stubbornly/contrary to expectations
difference/discrepancy/to differ/error/to err/to make a mistake
to differ from/to fall short of/lacking/wrong/inferior/Taiwan pr. [cha1]

sentences.english: Installed with proportional deviation display thermostat, to control temperature accurately.
sentences.chinese: 採用比例式偏差指示溫控器，可精確控制溫度。

sentences.english: Any deviation from this ideal must be penalized to the extent of the deviation.
sentences.chinese: 任何偏離這個理想，必須扣分的偏差程度。

sentences.english: The deviation made by the wind could be straightened by the computer.
sentences.chinese: 由風引起的偏差可由計算機予以校正。

sentences.english: Correspondingly, deviation detection can be used for different tasks.
sentences.chinese: 相應地，偏差檢測可用於不同的任務。

sentences.english: A report page that shows the actual deviating records for a given profession
sentences.chinese: 一個是報告頁面，顯示一種特定職業的偏差記錄。

sentences.english: This paper presents the experimental research on reducing flue gas temperature deviation by using counter-tangential air technology.
sentences.chinese: 採用一次風反切技術可有效減輕煙溫偏差。

sentences.english: The assembling errors for the stabilization mechanism can significantly influence the performance of sight-line stabilization.
sentences.chinese: 穩定機構的裝配誤差是造成視軸偏差的重要誤差源。

sentences.english: Explore the preventions and the solutions to the athletes' deviant behavior.
sentences.chinese: 探討運動員偏差行爲的預防及解決之道。

sentences.english: Misunderstanding of ODC concepts leads to bias.
sentences.chinese: 錯誤理解ODC概念將導致偏差。

sentences.english: Overprints, High reject rate, Large coldeviation.
sentences.chinese: 多次套印廢品率高，色彩偏差大。

sentences.english: Actual deviation of height of the spherical plain thrust bearing.
sentences.chinese: 推力關節軸承實際高度偏差。

sentences.english: Railway assets must bee-valuated in order to correct deviations of values of railway assets.
sentences.chinese: 爲糾正鐵路資產價值上的偏差，須對其進行資產評估。

sentences.english: A large deviation from the Brix specification can impact negatively on the quality of the drink.
sentences.chinese: 特定白利度的偏差會給飲料的質量帶來負面影響。

sentences.english: This article provides a kind of practicable plan of controlling deviation of the egg number of one gram.
sentences.chinese: 文章提供了一種控制克卵粒數偏差的可行性方案。

sentences.english: When disease or injury changes the stiffness of a tissue, things can go awry.
sentences.chinese: 如果傷病改變了組織的硬度，情況就可能出現偏差。

definition: to slip/to overlook by negligence/careless omission/oversight
